name: Ankita Sawarkar
title: Technical Expert
description: A passionate individual who always thrives to work on end-to-end products which develop sustainable and scalable social and technical systems to create impact.

about.title: Full Stack Development
description: ⚡ Developing scalable REST APIs with TDD, ensuring seamless integration and efficient data processing using Mockito for testing.
⚡ Building responsive website frontends using modern frameworks, optimizing user experience, performance, and accessibility across devices.
⚡ Creating containerized microservices with Agile practices, ensuring scalability, fault tolerance, and cloud maintainability.

about.title: Data Science & AI
about.subTitle: Data Science & AI
description: ⚡ Developing highly scalable models for various deep learning and statistical use cases.
⚡ Experience working with Computer Vision and NLP projects.
⚡ Complex quantitative modeling for dynamic forecasting and time series analysis.

about.title: Cloud Services
description: ⚡ Practice working on cloud platforms
⚡ Hosting and maintaining websites on virtual machine instances along with integration of databases
⚡ Deploying deep learning models on cloud to analyses model performance with hug data samples.

degrees.title: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Madras (Intellipaat)
degrees.subtitle: Advanced Certification in Data Science and AI
descriptions: ⚡ I have completed a variety of courses in Artificial Intelligence, covering topics like Machine Learning, and Statistics, and Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), including data cleaning and preprocessing techniques.
⚡ In addition, I have learned about Deep Learning, Data Analysis, Data Science, and Cloud Computing, and worked on projects in Image Processing and NLP.
⚡ During my courses, I completed projects focused on Predictive Analysis and Data Visualization using PowerBI and Tableau.
⚡ I have developed models and participated in interviews as part of my learning experience.

degrees.title: C-DAC: Centre for Development of Advanced Computing, India
degrees.subtitle: Post Graduation Diploma in Computer Science
descriptions: ⚡ I have completed a variety of courses in Computer Science and Information Technologies, covering topics like Explainable Software Design, Development, Testing, and Deployment.
⚡ Additionally, I have learned Database Management, and Full Stack Development.
⚡ As part of my learning, I developed creative and in-demand software using JAVA, SQL, and React with a focus on proper design and deployment.
⚡ During my time at the institute, I ranked in the top five of my department and worked on multiple projects and practice interviews.

degrees.title: Rashtrasant Tukadoji Maharaj Nagpur University
degrees.subtitle: B.Tech. in Electronics Engineering
descriptions: ⚡ Electronics concepts like circuit design, signal processing, and control systems help me understand complex systems, making software architecture and backend development easier.
⚡ Digital logic design and Boolean algebra enhance my ability to create efficient algorithms and implement data structures.
⚡ I gained foundational programming knowledge in DS, Algorithms, DBMS, OS, C++ and Java.
⚡ My logical thinking and problem-solving skills, vital for software development and system design.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subTitle: I have worked with many evolving startups as ML and DL Developer, Designer and Software Architect. I have also worked with some well established companies mostly as AI Developer. I love organising events and that is why I am also involved with many opensource communities as a representative.

experiences.title: Application Developer
description: I contributed to requirement analysis, system design, and troubleshooting for automating insurance products by converting monolithic services to microservices using JAVA, SQL, React, and AWS. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to automate data analysis with Python libraries and worked on NLP data modeling and fine-tuning strategies. Mentored junior developers to ensure timely project delivery.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
description: I worked on an e-commerce product service application, focusing on process automation to improve efficiency and profitability. Worked on invoice ticket grouping and predicting common issues to prioritise processes. I was involved in agile development activities, implementing RESTful APIs for invoice categorisation, improving performance by 40%, and enhancing user engagement. Collaborating closely with the ML team, I ensured efficient integration of text classification methodology.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
description: I designed and built a system to access reports from MongoDB, reducing conversion time by 70%, and contributed to requirement analysis and system troubleshooting.

experiences.title: Software Developer
description: I got experience with the real time start up with fast flowing environment. I collaborated in a team to build a complete Web Application for a bank HRMS system, handling everything from requirement analysis to deployment. My responsibilities included implementing algorithms, developing REST API backends, frontend, database mapping, and working on software architecture for mobile, web applications, and admin panels.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subTitle:
I have worked with many evolving startups as ML and DL Developer, Designer and Software Architect. I have also worked with some well established companies mostly as AI Developer. I love organising events and that is why I am also involved with many opensource communities as a representative.
My projects makes use of vast variety of latest technology tools. My best experience is to create Data Science projects and deploy them to web applications using cloud infrastructure.

projects.title: Research Analysis Tool
description: Developed LLM-based Chatbot for Research analysis to get relevant responses from specific articles by document upload and URL link using Vector database semantic search

projects.title: College Chatbot with internal database
description: LLM Chatbot system for College, Implement OpenAI functionality with prompt engineering to get response with human touch about internal College database will provide all detailed information about the campus, students fees, and grad with conversation format.

projects.title: Search Engine Application and CI/CD Pipeline using Jenkins
description: Developed a Faiss-based similarity search engine, deployed on Streamlit.
Indexed project descriptions with SBERT for semantic search and improved accuracy.
Optimized search efficiency using cosine similarity and query indexing with Faiss.
Built a CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment, testing, security checks, and containerization.
Streamlined DevOps practices to accelerate releases and maintain competitive edge.
